channel.title: Compiler
channel.description:
Anyone Have A Compiler That Is Compatible With JDK6 Update 3 (Offline Installation). Please Post The Compiler Code Here.
Thanks,
I0wneveryone.

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Try this:

[code]@echo off
title rs3 Revolution Compiler-Made by rs w00dcut

:Main
echo echo:::Rs w00dcut ftw!::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Enter one of the following, and press enter.
echo :::: Compile = Compiles your server.
echo :::: Exit = Exits the program
echo :::: Run = Runs your server
echo :::: Change = Change the backround and text of the compiler.
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

set /p choice=:: Choice:

if %choice%==compile goto com
if %choice%==exit goto exi
if %choice%==run goto run
if %choice%==change goto cha
if %choice%==Compile goto com
if %choice%==Exit goto exi
if %choice%==Run goto run
if %choice%==Change goto cha
if %choice%==COMPILE goto com
if %choice%==EXIT goto exi
if %choice%==RUN goto run
if %choice%==CHANGE goto cha

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Server Compiling
echo ::
echo ::Results:
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
javac *.java
echo :: Done!
pause
cls
goto main

:exi
cls
echo :: Thanks for using this compiler!
pause
exit

:run
cls
title Running Server…
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
cls
goto main

:cha
cls
echo :: Enter one of the following to change background colour.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo.
echo :: Enter one of the following to change text colour.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main
[/code]
